Here's my contribution:
The save folder should be located in
C:\Documents and Settings\USERNAME\Application Data\Kalypso Media - for XP users
You might want to keep this folder before patching.

Now, if it still crashes after applying the patch, there's no real improvement is there... Restarting from a previous save also worked with the standard version.
